text: == Regular season == ==Playoffs== The Capitals beat the New York Rangers in the Conference Quarter-Finals 4 games to 3, and lost to the Pittsburgh Penguins in the Conference Semi-Finals 3 games to 4. ==References== Category:2008 in ice hockey Category:2009 in ice hockey Category:National Hockey League team seasons Capitals
